src:
Naš maneken pravih počitnic ne pozna
Najuspešnejši slovenski maneken v tujini Gašper Tratnik je zadnja leta tako zaposlen, da komaj najde čas za krajši oddih.
06 Nov 2019, 17:15 by Roman Turnšek



Letos nekaj dni na Pagu, naslednjič v Afriko ali Ameriko.



Šoping na istanbulski tržnici



Milanska katedrala Duomo mu je zelo pri srcu. Fotografije: osebni arhiv


Manekenove počitnice so pogosto poslovna potovanja. Poleg snemanj so tu še srečanja s poslovnimi partnerji, druženje, kovanje načrtov in sklepanje poslov. Gašper Tratnik je izbral dva letošnja dogodka, in sicer v Milanu junija in septembra v Istanbulu.Milano mu je še posebno pri srcu. »Leta 2015 sem tam živel in delal osem mesecev za italijanske blagovne znamke. Letos pa ni bilo toliko manekensko, ampak so bila bolj srečanja s poslovnimi partnerji. Imam navado, da jih obiščem vsako leto, za kar menim, da je v poslu nujno. Druženje osebno, v živo. Enako je bilo v Istanbulu,« pravi 29-letni Gašper.


Milanska katedrala Duomo mu je zelo pri srcu. Fotografije: osebni arhiv

V Istanbulu še ni delal kot maneken, ima pa tam poslovne partnerje na drugih področjih. Čeprav srečanj in sestankov ni malo, si službene poti organizira tako, da je čas tudi za kanček turizma. »Rad se sprehodim po mestu, si ogledam znamenitosti. V Milanu je to denimo katedrala Duomo, v Istanbulu stolp Galata in glavna tržnica. Obiščem tudi prijatelje, zlasti v Milanu. To je moje železno pravilo,« pove.Zdi se, da postavni finalist tekmovanja za mistra Slovenije zadnji dve leti manj dela kot model. »Morda res, ne vem. Glede ponudb se nimam kaj pritoževati, veliko časa pa namenjam svoji blagovni znamki GT collection,« odgovarja.Gašper ima namreč uspešno lastno znamko, plod njegove ideje in dela. V ponudbi ima ročne ure, moški nakit, modne dodatke. Vajeti so v njegovih rokah, izdelke sam tudi reklamira. V Milanu že nekaj časa sodeluje s tovarno usnja, v Istanbulu pa se tržišče šele prav odpira. Dela je veliko in večina njegovih poti je povezana s tem.
Gašper ima uspešno lastno znamko GT collection.
Kako to zdrži? »Ne ravno lahko, a se navadiš. Zdaj se mi to zdi nekaj vsakdanjega. Moje delo je pač takšno. Veliko potujem kot model, veliko tudi v zvezi z blagovno znamko. Večino časa zadnja tri leta sem posvetil delu, ker mi je kristalno jasno, da brez nič ni nič. Počitka v obliki počitnic tako rekoč ne poznam, zato se znajdem in kombiniram s poslovnimi potovanji,« razkrije.Gašper je vajen potovati in tudi rad gre po svetu. Kam ga vleče? »Predvsem bi rad obiskal destinacije, kjer še nisem bil. Veliko sem delal in potoval po Aziji, nikoli pa denimo še nisem bil v Afriki ali Ameriki.« Kdaj bo šel, ne ve, kaj bo počel tam, tudi ne.Nikoli še nisem bil v Afriki in Ameriki.Ko skoči na kak dan oddiha domov v Slovenijo, gre na morje ali v gore. V začetku letošnjega leta si je privoščil tudi nekaj smučanja na Golteh, in proste trenutke je užival na polno. Sredi glavne poletne sezone pa si je nekaj dni utrgal za skok do morja. Na Pagu jih je s prijatelji preživel v kraju Mandre. »Zelo lepo in mirno mesto. Kot nalašč za odklop!«
text:
Our mannequin doesn't know the right vacation
The most successful Slovenian model abroad, Gašper Tratnik, has been so busy in recent years that he can hardly find time for a short break.
06 Nov 2019, 17:15 by Roman Turnsek



A few days this year in Pag, next in Africa or America.



Shopping at Istanbul Market



Duomo Cathedral in Milan is very sweet to him. Photos: personal archive


Mannequin vacations are often business trips. In addition to filming, there are meetings with business partners, socializing, forging plans and making deals. Gašper Tratnik has chosen two events this year, in Milan in June and September in Istanbul. Milano is especially fond of him. “In 2015, I lived there and worked for eight months for Italian brands. This year, however, it was not so much a model, but more meetings with business partners. I have a habit of visiting them every year, which I think is essential in business. Socializing in person, live. It was the same in Istanbul, "says Gasper, 29.


Duomo Cathedral in Milan is very sweet to him. Photos: personal archive

He has never worked as a model in Istanbul, but has business partners there in other areas. Although there are not many meetings and meetings, he organizes his business trips so that it is time for a bit of tourism. “I like to walk around the city, see the sights. In Milan, for example, Duomo Cathedral, Istanbul's Galata Tower and Main Market. I also visit friends, especially in Milan. This is my rule of thumb, "he says. It seems that the finalist for the Slovenian Mistress Competition has been doing less than a model for the last two years. “Maybe really, I don't know. I have nothing to complain about offers, and I spend a lot of time on my GT collection brand, "he replies. It offers watches, men's jewelry, fashion accessories. They are in his hands, he also advertises the products himself. He has been working with a leather factory in Milan for some time, and the market is just opening in Istanbul. He has a lot of work to do and most of his ways are connected.
Gasper has successfully owned its own GT collection.
How does it work? “Not easy, but you get used to it. Now this seems to me something mundane. My job is just that. I travel a lot as a model, a lot also in relation to branding. Most of the time I have spent the last three years working because it is crystal clear to me that there is nothing without nothing. Holidays in the form of vacations are almost unknown, so I find myself and combine with business trips, "he reveals. Where is it dragging him? “Most of all, I would like to visit destinations I have never been to. I've worked a lot and traveled around Asia, but I've never been to Africa or America, for example. "When will he go, he doesn't know what he's going to do there, not even. I've never been to Africa and America. home to Slovenia, going to the sea or the mountains. Earlier this year, he also enjoyed some skiing in the Golte, and enjoyed his free time to the fullest. In the middle of the main summer season, however, he struggled to jump to the sea for a few days. He spent them in Mandre with his friends in Pag. “Very nice and peaceful place. Perfect for disconnection! "
